title: Credit Card Payment Processing
description: As a customer, I want to pay for my order using a credit card so that I can complete my purchase securely.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter credit card details (number, expiry, CVV)
System validates card number using Luhn algorithm
System processes payment through payment gateway
User receives confirmation message upon successful payment
Failed payments display appropriate error messages
Payment information is encrypted during transmission

comments.author: Tech Lead
comments.text: Need to ensure PCI DSS compliance. Use tokenization for card storage.

comments.author: QA Lead
comments.text: Test cases created. Need to test with multiple card types.
